subject: Thank you for your refinance loan request, we are ready to lend some cash
body:
Your credit does not matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pocket money to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you TONIGHT (hurry, this offer will expire THIS EVENING):
$235,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
Hurry, when the deal is gone, it is gone. Simply complete this elementary form... 
Do not worry about approval, your credit score will not disqualify you!
http://bathaeonand.com/
